articles.author: Dan Diamond and Adam Cancryn
articles.title: U.S. to evacuate passengers from coronavirus cruise
articles.description: The decision represents an abrupt reversal in the U.S.’s approach to the coronavirus-afflicted cruise ship.
articles.content:
The decision represents an abrupt reversal in the U.S.s approach to the coronavirus-afflicted cruise ship, which had been held at sea since Feb. 4 and quickly became the largest concentration of cases outside China.

articles.author: Sarah Owermohle
articles.title: Could tobacco cure coronavirus? Don’t laugh
articles.description: The Pentagon's medical research arm credited the use of tobacco plants in 2012 for the quick development of 10 million doses of flu vaccine.
articles.content: The Pentagon's medical research arm credited the use of tobacco plants in 2012 for the quick development of 10 million doses of flu vaccine. "Plant-based solutions could over time prove more effective than the typical process growing a virus in eggs said Alan… [+5525 chars]
